meanings.definition: The quality of being selective or discriminating in making choices.
meanings.sent1: Her selectiveness in choosing friends ensured she surrounded herself with trustworthy people.
meanings.sent2: The selectiveness of the chef in choosing ingredients resulted in a delicious meal.
meanings.sent3: The selectiveness of the cat in choosing its nap spot led to it curling up in a shoebox.
meanings.sent4: His selectiveness in picking stocks was akin to finding hidden gems in a sea of options.
meanings.sent5: The selectiveness of the admissions committee made getting into the prestigious school a daunting task.

meanings.definition: The act of choosing carefully or with great care.
meanings.sent1: The selectiveness of the customer in choosing a gift showed how much thought went into the selection.
meanings.sent2: With great selectiveness, she picked out the perfect outfit for the special occasion.
meanings.sent3: The selectiveness of the squirrel in choosing nuts to store for winter was both impressive and adorable.
meanings.sent4: Her selectiveness in selecting a book to read was like finding a hidden treasure in a library.
meanings.sent5: The selectiveness of the detective in choosing clues led to solving the mysterious case.
